required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Exploratory Study Assessing Synchronisation of Egg Sacs With Degarelix
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Assessor-blind, Parallel Groups, Multi-centre, Exploratory Study Assessing the Impact of Subcutaneous Administration of Degarelix 2.5 mg on Synchronisation of Follicle Cohort Compared to Placebo and Evaluating the Effects of Degarelix 2.5 mg Started in the Mid-luteal or Early Follicular Phase on Endometrial Receptivity Compared to a Fixed Gonadotrophin Releasing Hormone Antagonist Protocol in Oocyte Donors Undergoing Controlled Ovarian Hyperstimulation for Assisted Reproductive Technologies

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this clinical research study is to investigate if degarelix can synchronise the growth of the egg sacs in the ovaries and if degarelix has any effect on the lining of the womb.

detailed_description.textblock:
For the primary end-point (data collected on Stimulation Day 1), the study will compare degarelix 2.5 mg administered in the mid-luteal phase to placebo administered in the mid-luteal phase.
After Stimulation Day 1 the placebo group will be split into two groups: a degarelix 2.5 mg follicular group and a ganirelix 0.25 mg group.

primary_outcome.measure: Coefficient of Variation of Follicular Sizes on Stimulation Day 1 (Follicles ≥ 2 mm)
primary_outcome.description: Explanation of the term "coefficient of variation": The coefficient of variation is a normalized measure of dispersion of a probability distribution.

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of Oocyte Donors With Adequate Secretory Transformation at the Endometrial Histology Evaluation 7 Days After Injection With Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin (hCG)
secondary_outcome.description: An adequate secretory endometrium 7 days after hCG injection was defined as secretory in the histological classification and with endometrial dating corresponding to the expected cycle day ±1 day.

arm_group.description: Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak and on Stimulation Day 6. Placebo will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1.

Placebo will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak. Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1 and Stimulation Day 6. or Placebo will be injected SC 7 days after LH peak and on Stimulation Day 1. Ganirelix 0.25 mg will be injected SC daily from Stimulation Day 6 until the last stimulation day.

intervention.description: Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak and on Stimulation Day 6. Placebo will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1.

Placebo will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak. Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1 and Stimulation Day 6. or Placebo will be injected SC 7 days after LH peak and on Stimulation Day 1. Ganirelix 0.25 mg will be injected SC daily from Stimulation Day 6 until the last stimulation day.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria
- Signed Informed Consent Form, prior to screening evaluations
- In good physical and mental health
- Pre-menopausal females between the ages of 18-35 years (both inclusive) at the time of randomisation
- Regular menstrual cycles of 26-35 days duration (both inclusive), presumed to be ovulatory
- Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 29 kg/m2 (both inclusive)
- Willing to donate the retrieved oocytes
- Willing to use an adequate barrier method of contraception from informed consent to Day hCG injection +7 and to use an adequate barrier or hormonal method of contraception from Day hCG injection +7 to the end-of-study visit
Exclusion Criteria
- Abnormal karyotype
- Any known clinically significant systemic disease (e.g., insulin dependent diabetes)
- Any known endocrine or metabolic abnormalities (pituitary, adrenal, pancreas, liver or kidney) which can compromise participation in the study
- Diagnosed with polycystic ovarian syndrome or endometriosis stage III/IV
- Diagnosed as "poor responder"
- History of recurrent miscarriage (defined as three consecutive spontaneous losses before weeks 24 of pregnancy)
- Pregnancy or lactation
- Use of any investigational drug during 3 months prior to start of the current COH cycle
- Previous participation in the study
- Hypersensitivity to any trial product

clinical_study.keyword: oocyte donors undergoing controlled ovarian hyperstimulation for assisted reproductive technologies

group.title: Degarelix Mid-luteal, 2.5 mg
group.description: Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak and on Stimulation Day 6. Placebo will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1.

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Placebo will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak. Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1 and Stimulation Day 6. or Placebo will be injected SC 7 days after LH peak and on Stimulation Day 1. Ganirelix 0.25 mg will be injected SC daily from Stimulation Day 6 until the last stimulation day.

participants_list.participants: All randomised and exposed subjects not withdrawn before Stimulation Day 1.
All randomised and exposed subjects not withdrawn before Stimulation Day 1.

outcome.title: Frequency of Oocyte Donors With Adequate Secretory Transformation at the Endometrial Histology Evaluation 7 Days After Injection With Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin (hCG)
outcome.description: An adequate secretory endometrium 7 days after hCG injection was defined as secretory in the histological classification and with endometrial dating corresponding to the expected cycle day ±1 day.
outcome.population: Subjects with evaluable endometrial biopsies 7 days after injection with hCG.

group.title: Degarelix Mid-luteal, 2.5 mg
group.description: Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak and on Stimulation Day 6. Placebo will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1.

group.title: Degarelix Follicular, 2.5 mg
group.description: Placebo will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak. Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1 and Stimulation Day 6

group.title: Ganirelix, 0.25 mg
group.description: Placebo will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak and on Stimulation Day 1. Ganirelix 0.25 mg will be injected SC daily from Stimulation Day 6 until the last stimulation day.

measure.title: Frequency of Oocyte Donors With Adequate Secretory Transformation at the Endometrial Histology Evaluation 7 Days After Injection With Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin (hCG)
measure.description: An adequate secretory endometrium 7 days after hCG injection was defined as secretory in the histological classification and with endometrial dating corresponding to the expected cycle day ±1 day.
measure.population: Subjects with evaluable endometrial biopsies 7 days after injection with hCG.

reported_events.time_frame: From signed informed consent till end-of-trial visit (approximately 12 +/- 2 weeks after oocyte retrieval)

group.title: Degarelix, 2.5 mg
group.description: Combination of these two groups: Degarelix Mid-luteal 2.5 mg and Degarelix Follicular 2.5 mg. Degarelix Mid-luteal, 2.5 mg: Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak and on Stimulation Day 6. Placebo will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1. Degarelix Follicular, 2.5 mg: Placebo will be injected subcutaneously (SC) 7 days after luteinizing hormone (LH) peak. Degarelix 2.5 mg will be injected SC on Stimulation Day 1 and Stimulation Day 6.

group.title: Ganirelix, 0.25 mg
group.description: Placebo will be injected SC 7 days after LH peak and on Stimulation Day 1. Ganirelix 0.25 mg will be injected SC daily from Stimulation Day 6 until the last stimulation day.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restiction on the PI is that the sponsor can review the draft manuscript prior to publication and can request delay of publication where any contents are deemed patentable by the sponsor or confidential to the sponsor. Comments will be given within four weeks from receipt of the draft manuscript.
